displayName: Spotify Overload - More Tools (18) | More Functions | More Rocking Out
description:
Enables Claude Code CLI or Desktop to interact with Spotify for playlist curation and management, among other goodies.
Rock Out with The Following Features:
- 🧠 Smart playlist curation 
- 🛤️ Deep track identification 
- 🕺 Song analysis (bpm, danceability, etc.)
- 🚀 Discovery & Recommendation (w/ seed validation)
